description:
Warm and dependable, this button-up is ready for travel or daily adventures. Ovik is named after Fjallraven’s hometown on the north coast of Sweden, where getting outside is part of the everyday life.Crafted from a soft and durable organic cotton.Button down collar.Articulated sleeves.Shirt-tail hem works tucked or untucked.Chest pocket fits a  bit of cash.Regular fit wears like an old favourite.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Fjallraven Ovik Flannel Shirt - Women's
